page.title: 19Leisure Time
page.content: I am going to write about what people do in their leisure time.Nowadays people have more leisure time than they used to.This is because some people have no jobs or some people may work part time.My mum works part time in a dentist. She cannot work full time because she has to look after me. In their leisure time people may swim or walk their dogs. North Leigh is out in the country side, so you have to go a long way to go to Witney sports centre.My mum plays squash and swims in her leisure time. My friend's mum works. She has no spare time except weekends.When it is hot, she sun-bathes and swims.Her dad works but is home 4.00 so he normally falls asleep or works in the garden. He sometimes plays football on Saturday. by Rachael Edmunds and Vicki Atkinson
